120 enum class RenderableIgnoreFlag {
121  kIgnoreSettings = 1 << 0, // avoid binding render settings
122  kIgnoreTextures = 1 << 1, // skip texture binding
123  kIgnoreUniforms = 1 << 2, // skip uniform binding
124  kIgnoreUniformMismatch = 1 << 3, // ignore errors raised by unrecognized uniforms
125 };
126 
128 enum class RenderablePassFlag {
129  // Flag is set if world bounds are ignored since geometry is determined at draw time.
130  // If this flag is set, unique color IDs are used for mouse picking calculations
131  kDeferredGeometry = 1 << 0 // Set automatically for glyphs
132 };
